sentences.en: He took lessons in Thai cookery.
sentences.cn: 他上了泰式烹饪的课程.

sentences.en: I'll tell you all about my Thai boxing lessons next time I write.
sentences.cn: 下次给你写信,我会告诉你我在泰国的拳击课程.

sentences.en: I'm also good in boxing, thai boxing and grasping hands of martial arts!
sentences.cn: 我也精通拳击 、 泰拳、国术擒拿手!

sentences.en: In the seventeenth century, a Thai king trained 20,000 elephants for battle.
sentences.cn: 在十七世纪, 泰国国王为战争训练了两万头大象.

sentences.en: She was interviewed about the death of the Thai worker on Israeli TV and she plans to continue to work for peace.
sentences.cn: 她接受了以色列电视台关于这位泰国工人致死的报道，并且她计划继续致力于为和平而工作。

sentences.en: So the next time you and your brother go out for Thai food you can make him look like a total wimp (I hate my brother).
sentences.cn: 所以改天你和你的兄弟去吃泰国菜，你就可以让他像个胆小鬼眼巴巴地看着你（我讨厌我的兄弟）。

sentences.en: So you're a member of the Free Thai Movement.
sentences.cn: 那么你是自由泰国运动的成员了.

sentences.en: Thai Airways said the plane had been given clearance to land.
sentences.cn: 泰国航空公司说，该飞机已经得到降落许可。

sentences.en: Thai food is hot and spicy.
Thai food's very moreish, isn't it?
Thai kick boxing or Japanese sumo?
The school teaches about 70 percent in English, and 30 percent in Thai.
sentences.cn: 这个学校的教学有百分之七十用英语, 百分之三十用泰国语.

sentences.en: Top quality Thai rice fetched $340 a tonne.
sentences.cn: 极品泰国香米卖得了1公吨340美元。

sentences.en: We needed to watch carefully when the Thai leaders associated with us would be replaced.
sentences.cn: 当与我们有交往的泰国领导人被撤换时,我们就要密切注意.

sentences.en: When I come back, I'm going to cook you guys a genuine Thai meal.
sentences.cn: 我回去的时候, 要给你做正宗的泰国饭.

sentences.en: Why didn't you tell me you're with the Free Thai Movement?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不告诉我你和自由泰国运动组织是一起的?

trans.tran_en: A Thai is a citizen of Thailand, or a person of Thai origin
